pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Ren2 quan2 Xuan1 yan2

sentences.english: These same words appear in the preamble to the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.
sentences.chinese: 《世界人權宣言》的序言部分也如是說。

sentences.english: I was proud to defend Nori's sacrifice in international human rights proclamations.
sentences.chinese: 而我則有幸能參與施明德對世界人權宣言的奉獻。

sentences.english: This is also a principle set by UDHR.
sentences.chinese: 這也是《世界人權宣言》所確定的原則。

sentences.english: This year(2008) marks the 60th anniversary of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights (UDHR).
sentences.chinese: 今年是聯合國《世界人權宣言》發表60週年。
